title: [Self-directed] Personalized Mathematics Education Design Based on Learning Analytics

context.prior_knowledge: Understanding of basic mathematical concepts and experience in using online learning tools
context.additional_context: Case-based instructional design to strengthen the connection to current practitioners' work

learning_goals: Learners will identify individual math learning patterns with over 80% accuracy using learning analytics tools.
Learners will design and apply personalized feedback systems based on learning data at least three times.
Learners will execute learning path adjustments with over 90% participation based on formative assessment results.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
